document_data.name: Titys's Emporium
document_data.mainbody: '''Titys's Emporium''' was a well-stocked general store located in [[Hillsfar]]. The Emporium was a favorite stop for [[adventurer]]s as the shopkeeper purchased anything brought to him with no questions asked.
document_data.Location: Titys's Emporium was located in the southeast corner of the city.
document_data.Inhabitants: The store was owned by an old man named [[Titys]].
